description: When attempting to create a NamedTuple with an excessive number of fields, an OverflowError is raised. This occurs due to the fact that the number of fields exceeds the maximum allowed, causing the system to be unable to allocate enough memory to store the NamedTuple.
output:
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 3, in <module>
TypeError: function takes at most 2 arguments (13 given)
